exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce and to an evaluable reference.

In environment U, V : UniformSpace c : V x : U P : V -> Prop y : ?M2370 P Unable to unify "?M2368 (fun x : ?M2363 => P ((fun x0 : ?M2363 => ?M2367 (?M2366 x0)) x))" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : U, ball x eps y -> (fun x : U => P ((fun _ : U => c) x)) y".

original: unfold continuous. intros. unfold locally. unfold within. unfold and. unfold within. unfold locally. unfold and. unfold locally. apply filterlim_comp with (V := V). apply filterlim_const. apply continuous_comp with (V := V). apply continuous_id.
